sentences.sentence: Ultrasound showed she was expecting twins.
sentences.translation: 超声波扫描显示她怀了双胞胎。

sentences.sentence: I had an ultrasound scan to see how the pregnancy was progressing.
sentences.translation: 我做了超声波扫描，检查妊娠情况。

sentences.sentence: Most women will be offered an ultrasound scan during pregnancy, although it's not obligatory.
sentences.translation: 大部分妇女怀孕期间都将进行超声波检查，尽管不是规定性的。
